task.author: user

steps.summary: Request: read .github/prompts/scaffoldAppPlatform.prompt.md and report project status.
Reviewed scaffold prompt requirements and repo structure (README.md, Makefile, deploy/.env.example, apps/shopping-list).
Status report based on existing scaffold artifacts vs prompt deliverables; no code changes required.
Inspected shopping-list handlers and shared database code to verify persistence behavior on page load (handlers/handler.go, handlers/items.go, shared/database/sqlite.go).
Request: run a test to confirm shopping-list returns saved items on page load.

Added handler-level test to seed SQLite data and verify Home renders saved items; fixed item scan to use bool so saved items load correctly (apps/shopping-list/handlers/handler_test.go, handler.go, items.go).

final_summary: Confirmed shopping-list persistence by adding a handler test and fixing bool scanning of the checked column so items load on page render.
